summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Adams Street from 8th Avenue South to 9th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks, and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 9300 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
